title: MIOV: Reordering MOVI for even better locality
authors:
Peter Pere\v{s}\'ini, Nathaniel K. Brown, Travis Gagie and Ben
  Langmead
abstract:
We consider how to reorder the rows of Nishimoto and Tabei's move structure
such that we more often move from one row to the next in memory.
subjects: Computing Research Repository/Data Structures and Algorithms
